sentences.english: Tune in tomorrow for her Top 10 Cons of Virginity
sentences.chinese: 文字筆調上接她的《童貞的十大壞處》。

sentences.english: The Virgo man is the last person on the Earth to end up marrying a frivolous and empty-headed woman.
sentences.chinese: 童貞座男生盡不會與無聊又愚蠢的女人結婚。

sentences.english: to high rewards in heaven as a virgin and as a poet.
sentences.chinese: 作爲一個有童貞的人和一個詩人在天堂的回報。

sentences.english: Now it goes without saying that we all know what virginity is.
sentences.chinese: 現在我們都心照不宣，知道什麼是童貞。

sentences.english: If not, the engagement will be cancelled.
sentences.chinese: 女孩若失去童貞，婚約就被解除。

sentences.english: Now, by my maidenhead, at twelve year old, I bade her come.
sentences.chinese: 憑着我十二歲時候的童貞發誓，我早就叫過她了。

sentences.english: She's making extraordinary claims for virginal oratory.
sentences.chinese: 她對童貞演講提出許多要求。

sentences.english: Approximately 25% of the participants responded that they had made a pledge to abstain from sex until marriage.
sentences.chinese: 大約25%的參與者說到他們已經立下了童貞誓約。

sentences.english: Try thinking about your virginity in another way.
sentences.chinese: 試着從另外一個角度來思考你的童貞。

sentences.english: Nora was deflowered by a man who worked in a soda-water factory.
sentences.chinese: 在汽水廠工作的一個男子奪去了諾拉的童貞。

sentences.english: In fact, Felicity makes it a goal to lose her virginity in the first season.
sentences.chinese: 其實，費利西蒂在第一季中失去童貞。

sentences.english: Couldn't we just lose our virginities again?
sentences.chinese: 不能再失去一次童貞就好嗎？

definition: (of a relationship) improper (adulterous, incestuous, teacher-student etc)/unseemly
Nihonshoki or Chronicles of Japan (c. 720) book of mythology and history
to drive a wedge between (allies, partners etc)
SS or Schutzstaffel, paramilitary organization in Nazi Germany
to write a word incorrectly/typo/(medicine) to mistakenly transplant (an infected organ etc)
